snippet: The Magic, behind J.J. Redick, shot 50 percent from the field in earning their first win since Jan. 16.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Orlando Magic snap 12-game losing streak with 110-104 victory over Portland Trail Blazers.
lead_paragraph: The Magic, behind J.J. Redick, shot 50 percent from the field in earning their first win since Jan. 16.

headline.seo: Magic Snap Skid at 12 With Win Over Blazers
headline.main: Magic Snap Skid at 12 With Win Over Blazers
